user_question: What are the latest advancements in wearable health technology, and can you generate an image of a futuristic health smartwatch?
final_answer: Recent advancements in wearable health technology include continuous glucose monitoring, advanced sleep tracking, and real-time ECG monitoring. Image of a futuristic health smartwatch generated. Wearable devices for mental health monitoring include devices that track stress levels, mood, and provide biofeedback for relaxation.
